news.title: How we developed a cheap, accurate, on-the-spot test for Ebola
news.summary: We have developed technology that reliably detects the Ebola virus in a blood sample seven times faster, ten times cheaper and 700 times safer than doing it in a lab.

news.title: EXPERT COMMENT: How we developed a cheap, accurate, on-the-spot test for Ebola
news.summary: Sterghios Moschos, Associate Professor in Cellular and Molecular Sciences, discusses the groundbreaking device that will help to fight the Ebola virus.
